Configure(IServiceCollection, byte[], string, string)

Configures the services for JWT bearer authentication.

public static void Configure(IServiceCollection services, byte[] key, string issuer, string audience)

Parameters

services IServiceCollection

The collection of services to configure.

key byte[]

The byte array representing the secret key used for token validation.

issuer string

The issuer of the JWT tokens.

audience string

The audience of the JWT tokens.
